text.section: Under one of the conditions described in subsection (a) of this section, a police department that takes an abandoned vehicle into custody shall give the required notice by posting a notice complying with the provisions of subsection (c) of this section in the circuit court of the county where the abandoned vehicle was found.

The notice:
May contain multiple listings of abandoned vehicles;
Shall contain the information required by § 25-204 of this subtitle; and
Shall be posted:
Within 15 days of the taking into custody of the vehicle; or
If the notice by posting under this section is made because of the return as undeliverable of a prior notice by certified mail, return receipt requested, bearing a postmark from the United States Postal Service, within 7 days of the return of that prior notice.
